1.content: Which Midna is gonna gain weight?
1.title: Starting

choices: Teleported the food elsewhere to enjoy
11.content:
Midna was riding on the wolf that was Link, the hero who would save Hyrule. Midna had finally gotten what she Wanted, the fused Shadows, so she was now able to break the barrier around Hyrule castle. But then one day, her stomach growled and she gave Link's ear a gental Nudge.

Midna; hang on a second Link. I'm getting kinda hungry, maybe we should go into to town and get something to eat, I mean you're a wolf so everyone will be too scared to stop you, and everyone seems to ignore me (seriously, I'm not the only one who noticed that right?). So lets go and get some food.

Link growled, not a big fan of Midna's idea, he had his principles.

Midna; Whats the big deal? you saw how expensive the food is at town, and you need your Rupees for weapons. Besides, you don't need to eat anything yourself, just scare people away from the food stalls. And whats the rush? the barriers not going anywhere.

Link pouted and decided to just let Midna have her fill. He wasn't sure why, but he felt like they would never see each other again after this adventure was done. So Link went into town and scared everyone away. After Link made sure everyone was out of sight, Midna...
11.title: Imp Midna (super cute)

choices: Liked her new stomach and wanted to make it bigger
she liked her stomach, but didn't want to get fat.
111.content: She began shoving food into her mouth. It didn't take long for her stomach to begin bloating from the mass consumption of food. She let out a loud burp and patted her now enlarged stomach. She began to rub it and she...
111.title: Started stuffing her face

choices: While I eat this, go get more food for me
1111.content: liked her new size. In fact, she loved it. "Hey, this is actually kinda nice. Who knew being fat could be fun?" Midna jiggled her fat, which caused her to giggle. She was really enjoying it. Then she had an idea. "I wonder, if being this fat is fun, I'll bet that it'll be more fun if i get even fatter!" Midna wasn't really talking to Link but he knew this would be a problem for him. He had to carry her after all but seeing as how he was a wolf, he couldn't really protest much other than a few growls. "Oh, be quiet you selfish wolf. We'll get your friend when I get my food. Hmm, it looks like there isn't any more food in this part of town. Let's look somewhere else." They traveled to the south part of town where Telma's bar was. Link realized that everyone there was gone too and felt pretty bad for scaring them all off. Midna, on the other hand, only felt more hungry as she smelled all the meals that were left there for the customers. "Well, if they don't want this food, I'll eat it for them." Midna said with a greedy smile. She floated over to the first table. She then looked at Link and said...
1111.title: Gonna need more food

choices: Who cares poor wolf-boy? Continue eating!!
I shouldn't run a risk...Leave the town and rest somewhere.
Wait, I feel a little bad...Link, I don't think eat more...Link?
1112.content:
"Urrrrp," Midna patted her belly covered in ice cream, chocolate, and much dessert. "I can't deny that I enjoy *Burp* this sense."
But then, she had an uneasiness. Do I gain weight if I continue eating? She don't wants to be look unsightly when she back to the princess. Obesity princess Midna! What a nightmare!

"Well..." Midna chugged orange juice (She did not yet notice that she's still stuffing). She wanted to enjoy more swimming pressure in her belly. She is troubled. obesity princess is out of the question but she can permit to 'Plump' princess.

"What do you think Link? ...ugh...c'mon.........*BUUUURP!!*...Sorry Link, could you pull me up to stand up? My belly's too heavy."
Link groaned and help Midna up. He clearly expressed dissatisfaction. After all, whatever happens, he must carry her.....But he had the nasty thought also. Midna is basically cute and good person, but sometimes she is too selfish...stomachache (and also forcefeeding, weight gain, excessive gas and so on) may be good as punishment for her. it is worthy to do in exchange for hard labor.
1112.title: Stuffed Imp and Displeased Wolf

choices: Place in chest at Link's to go get more food
112.content: Midna decided to teleport her food elsewhere to enjoy. Where does Midna decide to teleport her food?
112.title: Teleported the food elsewhere to enjoy

1122.content:
Midna decided that she would teleport her food to Link's chest in the basement of his home in Ordon. She chose to do this so that she could collect more food and enjoy a large feast all at once. Midna then remembered that during their quest up Death Mountain she seen a door with Shikah markings. She recalled that only the chosen hero could open these doors. So she told Link about the door and told him there would be a great treasure inside. So Midna teleported them to the door at Death Mountain. Between Link and her twili powers, the door opens. The dungeon is full of enemies and traps they have to fight through. As they defeat enemies Midna claims what meat and food she can from them and sends it into the Twili realm to later place in Link's chest. As they near the end Midna spots a sign that reads "Great Goron treasure lies ahead, but those who wish to wield Goron treasure must prove they hold the strength of a Goron.

Midna and Link go into the next room to see two sumo rings, each with a large Goron sitting in a throne at the end of each. The Goron address our heros with booming voices, "Who are you?" Asked one Goron, to that link replied in his usual silent manner. And Midna explained, "We have came here to claim the mighty Goron treasures." The other Goron looks at her and replied, " We have two treasures, one for each of you, for you to claim them you must beat one of us each in a sumo match.

What will our heros decide to do?
1122.title: More! More! More!

11221.content:
The heros decided to take the Gorons up on their challenges. Link begins by putting on his iron boots, his secret to winning. Shhh! Don't let the Goron know. However the other Gorons watching the matches are all focused on Midna, because she is a little imp going up against a huge Goron. Midna steps into the ring and the states her opponent into the face. "Ding." The battle begins. Midna begins by charging the Goron, the Goron doesn't move an inch. The Goron attempts to retaliate by slapping her, Midna dodges and seeing that slapping is allowed she uses her hair hand to slap the Goron, she then uses it to wrap the Goron and throws it right out of the ring. Midna won her match, and surprise surprise, link one his.

The Goron told them to step up and claim their prizes. Link opens his chest to find an upgrade for his bow, it allows him to fire three arrows at once. Midna flips the lid on her chest and look inside to find...
11221.title: The battle begins.

choices: Eat and then help Link if he needs it.
112212.content:
Midna grabs the mystery box inside her chest and teleports herself and Link back to his house. She opens the mystery box to find a food cloning device,( she gets it either way lol ) a coupon for a free all you can eat buffet, and a master key with a note that says, "This key will grant access to a room containing a meal fit for royalty." The key also notes, "This key will only work for the true ruler of the Twilight Realm."
On the back of the note is a map showing where the master lock for the key is located. The map shows a detailed description of a back entrance into Hyrule Castles food storage catacombs, that lead to multiple food storage rooms. Midna tells Link she wants all the food in the storage rooms, so they teleport to the location the entrance should be at. As this area is still covered by the Twili Link is in his wolf form. Midna finds no door but only a howling stone. She looks at link with sad eyes and she asked, "Link, will you please use this howling stone for me to show the hidden entrance to the catacombs. I'm sure there will be access to the palace from inside allowing you to go save Princess Zelda." Link realizes Midna is correct and inside he could transform back to human. Link howls the notes on the stone and a door hidden on the castle wall opens and behind the door is a gate that has a master lock on it. Midna sees the lock and places the key in hoping it will work. At this point Midna is excited, one, because it means she is the true ruler of the Twilight Realm, but mostly because she can access all the royal food storage rooms.

Midna proceeds to unlock all the storage rooms. Each room is at least double the size of Link's house, and all are stocked full of fatty sweets super tempting to Midna, while Midna is drooling over all the food Link runs ahead to save the Princess. Midna is now faced with a tough decision.
112212.title: Mystery box

1122122.content: As Midna was decided what to do her stomach made the loudest, biggest growl it had ever made, she took this as her body's way of helping her decided. Now where to eat this food she wondered?
1122122.title: Hunger wins!

choices: Midna researches how to grow an environment in a Twili chest
Midna reaserches how to become full size.
11221222.content: Midna felt she should get all her food, so she teleports everything from the palace to the Twili realm, she then stops at Link's and pick up everything from the chest, she ten heads to the buffet and gets all the food they have, she then heads to Hyrule field, once there she placed all her food out in front of her, it took up over a whole mile of land. She then decided the best way to multiply it would be to place it all into a Twili chest, (they hold as much as needed), and then multiply the chest creating another chest with the same amount of food as the original. The multiply device also holds a number off small crystals, each with a number on them, that number represents how many times an item is multiplied. She then opened one chest and tossed in a times 3 crystal, another grew back in it's place. The crystal then made the amount of food in the chest 3 times more. Midna used her hair hand to lift the chest up. Midna then opened her mouth wide and dumped all the food into her mouth, and without chewing, Midna began swallowing large amounts of food, and each time she swallowed her stomach expanded in size. And as a Twili she has the ability to choose when to digest her food. Midna is watching her belly grow, her eyes wide and mouth watering as she sees how big she is becoming, she has no real need for all this food, other than the fact that she enjoys being large. Midna continues to watch herself grow larger and larger as she swallows more and more food. After about and hour she swallows the last bite that was in the chest. Midna looks in almost disbelief over how large her stomach has become. Midna decides to see if she can still float at such a large size, discovering she can she believes there is no limit to her powers. Meanwhile Link had just defeated Puppet Zelda, Midna uses her powers to hide her large stomach. She arrives at the palace just as Ganondorf takes form of the dark beast, once fully formed Midna who already had a plan, used a spell to lock him into that form, Ganondorf charged as Midna dodged and he then teleported into the Twili realm, he set up multiple portals to come out of, Midna predicted he would choose the one behind Link, as he began to charge out Midna opened up a Twili chest trapping him inside. She then takes Link and herself inside the chest to defeat him. Once in the chest Midna reveal her gigantic belly. Link looks over at Midna in shock, and then focuses on beating Ganondorf. Midna charged Link's sword with the power to take down Ganondorf with one strike. Midna then tossed link into the air and then taunted Ganondorf causing him to charge, he came at Midna with all his speed and when he hit her stomach she giggled and then held him down with her hair hand, Link them came down and hit Ganondorf with a finishing blow. Ganondorf then laid there lifeless. Midna decide that she would use his body as extra food. As the chests can hold unlimited amounts, she and Link exited the chest and she tossed in an infinity crystal, causing his body to multiply infinitely. Her and Link then parted ways. Midna then returns to the Twili realm with all her chest to do some research.
11221222.title: The More Food the Merrier

12.content: Seriously, you people are just too predictible. But whatever, how's she gonna gain?
12.title: Normal Midna (a perverts dream come true)

choices: He begins to feed her magic food which causes a lot of weight gain
12222.content: It had been a few months since Midna had returned home. As she was walking around her castle, bored, she noticed a familiar figure in the distance. "Link?" Minda yelled to the figure. She began to run up to it, overjoyed at the thought of her old partner. But as she got closer, the figure changed into a still familiar but less joyful one. The figure turned around to reveal himself as none other than Zant! "Wha- Zant? But how? Link and I blew you up!" the Twilight Princess stood shocked and confused. "Why so surprised, princess? You didn't actually think that you old ancestor's magic could beat that of the Goddesses of Hyrule, did you? Heh heh heh. Well I can assure you that I am very much alive." Zant laughed at Midna's foolishness. "You should have left that Mirror in tact, my dear. Now you're trapped in here with me and there is nowhere for you to run. Oh, and by the way, look what I got." Zant held up the Triforce of Power. "How did you get that? I thought it was sealed away when Ganondorf died." Midna was now more worried. She knew Ganondorf had become extremely powerful with it so who knew what Zant could do. "No, no, it was merely passed on to his successor. With it's power, I will remove you from the picture and rebuild my armies. I will create a way out of this god-forsaken realm and take over all of Hyrule. Let's start by immobilizing you..." Zant walked toward her with an evil smirk on his face.
12222.title: And so it Begins...

Soon there was a big explosion and when the smoke cleared...

info.description:
The Twilight Princess/Imp Midna got bored and decided to get a meal, then without realizing it, she got fat.

Rules
1. Story Has to be about Midna
2. No Yaoi (seriously, I do not want to see that)
3. Only female weight gain
